original_text: Even while they were worshipping the Lord, they continued to serve their own idols. Their children and their grandchildren continue to live as their fathers did, even today.
korean_text: 이 여러 민족이 여호와를 경외하고 또 그 아로새긴 우상을 섬기니 그들의 자자 손손이 그들의 조상들이 행하던 대로 그들도 오늘까지 행하니라

sentences.original_text: Even while they were worshipping the Lord
they continued to serve their own idols
continue to live as their fathers did
sentences.korean_translation: 조상들이 살던 방식대로 계속 살고 있다
